processing_structure.text: Comment: Input: one integer, Output: sum of its divisors
Loop from 1 to the input value

advice.text: You already wrote high-level steps; double-check they match the task: read an integer and produce the sum of its divisors.
Think about what must happen inside the loop: test candidate numbers and add those that divide the input to the running total.
